skills.name: Arc Lash
description: Unleash arcing lightning that deals {value2} damage to enemies in front of you. Every 10 times Arc Lash swipes, it Stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds.
skills.enchantment: When you use a Cooldown, enemies around you are Stunned for {value1} seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: If Arc Lash's initial swipe Critically Strikes, it swipes an additional time.

runes.name: Glinting
description: Hitting a Stunned enemy with Arc Lash reduces your Cooldowns by 0.25 seconds.

runes.name: Flickering
description: Gain +6% Movement Speed for 5 seconds per enemy hit with Arc Lash, up to +18%.

skills.name: Fire Bolt
description: Hurl a flaming bolt, dealing {value2} damage and Burning for {value3} damage over 8 seconds.
skills.enchantment: Direct damage from Skills applies additional {value1} Burning damage over 8 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Fire Bolt pierces through Burning enemies.

runes.name: Glinting
description: Critical Strikes with Fire Bolt increase the Burning damage you deal to the enemy by 20% for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Flickering
description: Fire Bolt generates Mana when hitting a Burning enemy.

skills.name: Frost Bolt
description: Throw a bolt of frost at an enemy, dealing {value2} damage and Chilling them for 15%.
skills.enchantment: Direct damage from Skills applies up to {value1} Chill.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Frost Bolt has a 15% chance to explode on Chilled enemies, hitting surrounding enemies. Chance increased to 100% against frozen enemies.

runes.name: Glinting
description: Frost Bolt generates Mana when hitting Chilled or Frozen enemies.

runes.name: Flickering
description: Frost Bolt makes Frozen enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Spark
description: Launch a bolt of lightning that shocks an enemy 4 times, dealing {value2} damage each hit.
skills.enchantment: Killing an enemy has a {value1} chance to form a Crackling Energy.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Each time Spark hits its primary target, it has a 40% chance to hit up to 3 additional enemies, dealing 6% damage. If there are no other enemies to hit, Spark instead deals x20% increased damage to its primary target.

runes.name: Glinting
description: Spark grants 2% increased Critical Strike Chance per cast for 5 seconds, up to 8%.

runes.name: Flickering
description: Each time Spark hits an enemy it has a 3% chance to form a Crackling Energy.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
description: Unleash a stream of lightning that deals {value1} damage and chains between Nearby enemies and you up to 5 times, prioritizing enemies.
skills.enchantment: Chain Lightning forms automatically after spending 100 Mana.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Chain Lightning gains a 3% increased Critical Strike Chance per bounce.

runes.name: Greater
description: If Chain Lightning bounces off of you, its next hit deals x10% increased damage.

runes.name: Destructive
description: When Chain Lightning Critically Strikes, it has a 25% chance to form a Crackling Energy.

skills.name: Charged Bolts
description: Release 5 bolts of lightning that course along the ground in an erratic pattern, dealing {value1} damage.
skills.enchantment: When you Stun an enemy, there's a 40% chance to release 3 Charged Bolts from them.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Hitting an enemy at least 3 times with the same cast of Charged Bolts releases a lightning nova, dealing 24% damage to enemies around them.

runes.name: Greater
description: Charged Bolts deals x25% increased damage to Stunned enemies.

runes.name: Destructive
description: Hitting an enemy with Charged Bolts reduces their damage dealt by 20% for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Fireball
description: Hurl an exploding ball offire, dealing {value1} damage to surrounding enemies.
skills.enchantment: When you kill an enemy, they explode in a Fireball for 50% of its damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Fireball's radius is increased based on distance traveled, up to 50%.

runes.name: Greater
description: Fireball deals 10% of the Burning damage you've applied to enemies as additional direct damage.

runes.name: Destructive
description: Fireball's explosion's Critical Strike Damage is increased by +10%. Each enemy it hits increases this bonus by +5%, up to +25% total.

skills.name: Frozen Orb
description: Unleash an orb that Chills and expels piercing shards, dealing {value1} damage. Upon expiration, Frọzen Orb explodes, dealing {value2} damage and Chilling enemies.
skills.enchantment: Whenever you cast a Non-Basic Skill, you have a 20% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: When cast above 50 Mana, Frọzen Orb‘s explosion damage is increased by 30%.

runes.name: Greater
description: Frọzen Orb's explosion restores 5 Mana when hitting a Frozen enemy.

runes.name: Destructive
description: Frọzen Orb‘s explosion has a 25% chance to make all enemies hit Vulnerable for 2 seconds. Frọzen Orb always makes Frozen enemies Vulnerable.

skills.name: Ice Shards
description: Launch 5 shards that deal {value1} damage each. Deals x25% increased damage to Frozen enemies.
skills.enchantment: Ice Shards automatlcally conjure and fly towards Frozen enemies.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Ice Shards have a 40% chance to ricochet to another enemy. Ice Shards always ricochet off of Frozen enemies.

runes.name: Greater
description: While you have a Barrier active, casts of Ice Shards treat enemies as if they were Frozen.

runes.name: Destructive
description: Hitting an enemy with 5 Ice Shards in a single cast makes them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Incinerate
description: Channel a beam of fire, Burning enemies for {value1} damage per second. Damage per second increases over 4 seconds, up to {value2} .
skills.enchantment: Every 18 seconds, a serpent spawns and Incinerates enemies for 8 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description:
While channeling lncinerate, you Burn
enemies around you for 15% of the
damage per second.

runes.name: Greater
description: Every 4 seconds an enemy has been hit by lncinerate, they are Immobilized for 1 second.

runes.name: Destructive
description: Enemies deal 20% less damage while Burning from Incinerate.

skills.name: Flame Shield
description: Engulf yourself in flames for {value1} seconds, Burning surrounding enemies for {value2} damage per second.
While Flame Shield is active, you are Immune.
skills.enchantment: Flame Shield automatically activates when you take fatal damage. Can only happen once every 120 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Flame Shield grants +25% Movement Speed while active.

runes.name: Mystical
description: You gain 25% Mana Cost Reduction while Flame Shield is active.

runes.name: Shimmering
description: Flame Shield Heals you for 50% of your missing Life.

skills.name: Frost Nova
description: Unleash a torrent of frost, Freezing enemies around you for 3 seconds.
skills.enchantment: Lucky Hit: Your Conjuration Skills have up to a 30% chance to unleash a Frost Nova when hitting enemies.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Killing enemies Frozen by Frost Nova reduces its Cooldown by 1 seconds, up to 4 seconds per cast.

runes.name: Mystical
description: Frost Nova makes enemies Vulnerable for 4 seconds, increased to 6 seconds against Bosses.

runes.name: Shimmering
description: Frost Nova generates Mana per enemy hit.

skills.name: Ice Armor
description: A Barrier of ice forms around you for 6 seconds, absorbing {value1} of your Base Life in damage. While Ice Armor is active, 5% of your damage dealt is added to its Barrier.
skills.enchantment: Upon getting hit, you have a 5% chance apply Ice Armor.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: While Ice Armor is active, your Mana Regeneration is increased by 25%.

runes.name: Mystical
description: Damage against Vulnerable enemies contributes 50% more to Ice Armor's Barrier.

runes.name: Shimmering
description: Enemies that hit you while Ice Armor is active have a 15% chance to become Frozen for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Teleport
description: Transform into lightning, becoming Unstoppable and surging to the target location, dealing {value3} damage around you upon arrival.
skills.enchantment: Evade is replaced with a short range Teleport on a {value2} second Cooldown.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Teleport's Cooldown is decreased by 0.5 seconds per enemy hit, up to 3 seconds.

runes.name: Mystical
description: For 4 seconds after Teleporting, Crackling Energy hits 2 additional enemies.

runes.name: Shimmering
description: After Teleporting, you gain 30% Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Hydra
description: Summon a 3-headed hydra for 10 seconds. Each head spits fire at enemies, dealing {value1} damage.
Maximum 1 active Hydras at a time.
skills.enchantment: After spending 300 Mana, a 5-headed Hydra spawns for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: While Healthy, your casts of Hydra gain 1 additional head.

runes.name: Invoked
description: After you Critically Strike, your Hydras gain 30% Critical Strike Chance for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Summoned
description: Hydra also Burns enemies for an additional 12% of its Base damage dealt over 6 seconds.

skills.name: Ice Blades
description: Conjure a pair of ice blades for 6.0 seconds that rapidly slash enemies for {value1} damage and have a 30% chance to make them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
skills.enchantment: For every 40 seconds in Cooldowns you spend, you spawn an Ice Blades on a random enemy.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Ice Blades's Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds each time it hits a Vulnerable enemy.

runes.name: Invoked
description: Your Ice Blades gain +10% increased Attack Speed per active Ice Blades.

runes.name: Summoned
description: 20% of Enhanced Ice Blades's Cooldown reduction is applied to your other Skills.

skills.name: Lightning Spear
description: Conjure a spear of lightning that seeks out enemies for 6.0 seconds, dealing {value1} damage per hit.
skills.enchantment: Absorbing Crackling Energy has a 10% chance to conjure a Lightning Spear.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: After Critically Striking, Lightning Spear gains a 5% increased stacking Critical Strike Chance for its duration.

runes.name: Invoked
description: Lightning Spear Stuns enemies for 2 seconds when Critically Striking.

runes.name: Summoned
description: Collecting Crackling Energy increases the damage of your next Lightning Spear cast by 20%, up to 100%.

skills.name: Blizzard
description: Summon a frigid blizzard that deals {value1} damage and continually Chills enemies for 18% over 8 seconds.
skills.enchantment: Every 15 seconds, a Blizzard forms over you and follows you for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Blizzard deals x25% increased damage to Frozen enemies.

runes.name: Wizard's
description: While you have an active Blizzard, your Core Skills cost 10% less Mana.

runes.name: Mage's
description: When cast above 50 Mana, Blizzard's duration is increased by 4 seconds.

skills.name: Firewall
description: Create a wall of flames that Burns enemies for {value1} damage over 8 seconds.
skills.enchantment: Each time an enemy takes Burning damage, there's a 5% chance to spawn 2 Firewalls underneath them for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Enemies take 25% increased Burning damage from you while standing in Firewall.

runes.name: Wizard's
description: You gain 5% increased Mana Regeneration per active Firewall, up to 25%.

runes.name: Mage's
description: Enemies continue Burning for 3 seconds after leaving Firewall.

skills.name: Meteor
description: Summon a meteor that strikes the target location, dealing {value1} damage and Burning the ground for {value2} damage over 3 seconds.
skills.enchantment: Lucky Hit: Up to a 8% chance for a Meteor to fall on enemies.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: If a cast of Meteor hits 3 or more enemies, there is a 30% chance an additional Meteor falls on the same location.

runes.name: Wizard's
description: Meteor's impact Immobilizes enemies for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Mage's
description: Meteor falls 30% faster.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
description: Discharge a ball of lightning that slowly moves forward, continually zapping enemies for {value1} damage.
skills.enchantment: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a 25% chance to spawn a static Ball Lightning.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Ball Lightning's damage rate is increased by 200% of your Attack Speed Bonus.

runes.name: Wizard's
description: If an enemy is hit at least 4 times by a cast of Ball Lightning, a Crackling Energy is formed. Can only happen once per cast.

runes.name: Mage's
description: After hitting Close enemies 50 times with Ball Lightning, your next cast of it Stuns enemies hit for 1 second.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
description: Encase yourself in ice, becoming Immune for 4 seconds, continually dealing 25% damage, and Chilling enemies for 14%. When Deep Freeze expires, it deals 100% additional damage.
Casting Deep Freeze again ends the effect early.

runes.name: Prime
description: When Deep Freeze ends, gain 10% of your Base Life as a Barrier for 6 seconds for each enemy you Froze while it was active.

runes.name: Supreme
description: When Deep Freeze ends, your Non-Ultimate Cooldowns are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Inferno
description: Summon a fiery serpent that continually constricts the target area, Burning enemies for 295% damage over 8 seconds.

runes.name: Prime
description: Inferno repeatedly Pulls enemies to its center.

runes.name: Supreme
description: While Inferno is active, your Pyromancy Skills cost no Mana.

skills.name: Unstable Currents
description: Lightning surges within you for 10 seconds. Whenever you cast a Shock Skill, a random Core, Conjuration, or Mastery Shock Skill is also cast.

runes.name: Prime
description: Unstable Currents increases your Attack Speed by +25% while active.

runes.name: Supreme
description: While Unstable Currents is active, Crackling Energy continually pulses and consumes no charges.

skills.name: Align the Elements
description: You gain {value1} Damage Reduction against Elites for each second you haven't taken damage from one, up to 40%.

skills.name: Avalanche
description: Lucky Hit: Your Frost Skills have up to a 10% chance to make your next cast of Ice Shards, Frọzen Orb, or Blizzard consume no Mana and deal x40% increased damage. Chance is doubled against Vulnerable enemies.

skills.name: Cold Front
description: While you have a Barrier active, you apply {value1} more Chill.

skills.name: Combustion
description: Your Burning effects deal x2% increased damage per unique source of Burning you have applied to the enemy. If the enemy is Burning from 3 or more sources, this bonus is doubled.

skills.name: Conduction
description: Critical Strikes with Shock Skills increase your Movement Speed by + {value1} for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Conjuration Mastery
description: You deal x {value1} increased damage for each active Conjuration.

skills.name: Convulsions
description: Lucky Hit: Shock Skills have up to a {value1} chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Coursing Currents
description: Hitting enemies with Shock Skills increases your Critical Strike Chance by {value1} . Resets upon getting a Critical Strike.

skills.name: Crippling Flames
description: Lucky Hit: Your Pyromancy Skills have up to a {value1} chance to Immobilize enemies for 2 seconds. This chance is doubled while you are Healthy.

skills.name: Devastation
description: Your Maximum Mana is increased by {value1} .

skills.name: Devouring Blaze
description: You deal x {value1} increased Critical Strike Damage against Burning enemies. If they are also Immobilized, this bonus is increased to x {value2} .

skills.name: Electrocution
description: Enemies deal {value1} less damage for 5 seconds after being Critically Struck by your Shock Skills.

skills.name: Elemental Attunement
description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a {value1} chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your Defensive Skills. Can only happen once every 10 seconds.

skills.name: Elemental Dominance
description: Your Core Skills deal x {value1} increased damage when cast above 50 Mana.

skills.name: Endless Pyre
description: You deal increased Burning damage to enemies for each second they remain Burning, up to {value1} after 5 seconds.

skills.name: Esu's Ferocity
description: Your Fire Critical Strike Damage is increased by 25% against enemies above 50% Life. Your Fire Critical Strike Chance is increased by +5% against enemies below 50% Life.
Killing an enemy with a Critical Strike grants both bonuses against all enemies for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Fiery Surge
description: Killing a Burning enemy increases your Mana Regeneration by {value1} for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Frigid Breeze
description: Lucky Hit: Cold damage against Vulnerable enemies has up to a 20% chance to generate {value1} Mana.

skills.name: Glass Cannon
description: You deal x {value1} increased damage, but take x {value2} more damage.

skills.name: Hoarfrost
description: You deal x {value1} increased damage to Chilled enemies, and x {value2} increased damage to Frozen enemies.

skills.name: Icy Touch
description: You deal {value1} increased Cold damage to Vulnerable enemies.

skills.name: Icy Veil
description: Your Barriers have a {value1} increased duration.

skills.name: Inner Flames
description: Your Pyromancy Skills deal x {value1} increased damage while you are Healthy.

skills.name: Invigorating Conduit
description: Upon absorbing Crackling Energy, you gain {value1} Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shield
description: Everytime you spend 100 Mana, you gain {value1} Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Overflowing Energy
description: Crackling Energy hits 1 additional enemy. Each time Crackling Energy hits an enemy, your Shock Skill Cooldowns are reduced by 0.1 seconds, increased to 0.25 seconds against Elites.

skills.name: Permafrost
description: Frost Skills deal x {value1} increased damage to Elites.

skills.name: Potent Warding
description: After casting a Non-Basic Skill, you gain {value1} Resistance to all elements and {value2} additional Resistance to that Skill's element for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Precision Magic
description: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by {value1} .

skills.name: Protection
description: Using a Cooldown grants {value1} of your Maximum Life as a Barrier for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Shatter
description: After Freeze expires, enemies explode for 25% of the damage you dealt to them while Frozen.

skills.name: Shocking Impact
description: Every time you Stun an enemy, you deal {value1} Lightning damage to them.

skills.name: Snap Freeze
description: Lucky Hit: Frost Skills have up to a {value1} chance to instantly Freeze.

skills.name: Soulfire
description: After standing still for 1.5 seconds, your Pyromancy Skills cost {value1} less Mana.

skills.name: Static Discharge
description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Shock Skills have up to a {value1} chance to form a Crackling Energy.

skills.name: Vyr's Mastery
description: Close enemies take x10% increased damage from your Shock Skills and deal 20% less damage to you. Critical Strikes increase these bonuses by 25% for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Warmth
description: Every 1 second, you Heal for {value1} of your Maximum Life for each Nearby Burning enemy. Healing increased to {value2} from Bosses.
